headline: Is There Still Value In Aon (AON) Shares After Mixed Recent Returns?
summary: If you are wondering whether Aon shares at around US$350 are offering fair value or a potential opportunity, the starting point is to understand what the current price really reflects. Over the very short term Aon has been mixed, with a 5.2% gain over the last 7 days, a 0.3% decline over 30 days, a 1.7% return year to date, and a 7.6% decline over 1 year. The 3 year and 5 year returns sit at 12.3% and 60.8% respectively. Recent news coverage around Aon has focused on its role as a major...

headline: Aon partners with SecurityScorecard to widen cyber risk offering
summary: Under the arrangement, SecurityScorecard’s outside-in risk management tools will be made available alongside Aon’s CyQu data platform.

headline: Insurance Brokers Q4 2025 Update
summary: After years of steep increases, property insurance rates, especially in E&S and Reinsurance, are falling due to a quiet hurricane season and an influx of capital. Read more here.
